Package com.abhyudayasharma.texteditor.editor

Class Editor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.abhyudayasharma.texteditor.editor.Editor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class Editor
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A text editor that uses StyledDocument for setting attributes to each character.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • saveAs

        private void saveAs​(java.lang.String filePath,
                    boolean checkExists)
        Internal method which provides the logic for writing the textPane's StyledDocument to the given filepath.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path of the file.
        checkExists - check for replacing the file if already exists

      • save

        Save the current text stored in the textPane as a StyledDocument.

      • open

        private void open​(java.io.File file)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Opens a supported Styled Document Format file
        Parameters:
        file - the Styled Document File to be opened.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when unable to open the file

      • selectionHasAttribute

        private boolean selectionHasAttribute​(java.util.function.Function<javax.swing.text.AttributeSet,​java.lang.Boolean> propertyChecker)
        Checks whether each element of the selection has the property applied.
        Parameters:
        propertyChecker - a Function from StyleConstants like StyleConstants::isBold
        Returns:
        true if all chars in the selection return true for the propertyChecker, false otherwise.

      • isSelectionBold

        public boolean isSelectionBold()
        Checks if the selected text is bold
        Returns:
        true if every character in the selection is bold. Otherwise false.

      • isSelectionItalic

        public boolean isSelectionItalic()
        Checks if the selected text is italic
        Returns:
        true if every character in the selection is italic. Otherwise false.

      • isSelectionUnderline

        public boolean isSelectionUnderline()
        Checks if the selected text is underlined
        Returns:
        true if every character in the selection is underline. Otherwise false.

      • toggleAttributeOnSelection

        private void toggleAttributeOnSelection​(java.lang.String styleName,
                                        java.util.function.BiConsumer<javax.swing.text.Style,​java.lang.Boolean> attributeSetter,
                                        java.util.function.BooleanSupplier selectionAttributeChecker)
        Toggles an attribute on the selection. Toggle is based on the value of selectionAttributeChecker.
        Parameters:
        styleName - the name for the attribute style
        attributeSetter - BiConsumer used to set the attribute on the selection, for example, StyleConstants::setBold.
        selectionAttributeChecker - checks whether the attribute is currently applied. The value returned by this is used to toggle the attribute.

      • addAttribute

        private void addAttribute​(javax.swing.text.Style style)
        Utility function to add a style to the selected text
        Parameters:
        style - the style to be added

      • getSavedFilePath

        public java.lang.String getSavedFilePath()
        Returns the path to the file saved.
        Returns:
        null if no file has been saved yet, the path of the file written otherwise

      • findText

        public void findText()
        Finds text in the textPane with a dialog for input

      • findText

        private boolean findText​(java.lang.String str,
                         boolean caseSensitive,
                         boolean lastIndex)
        Finds text in the textPane
        Parameters:
        str - the string to be found
        caseSensitive - find text ignoring case if false
        lastIndex - finds last index if true, first index otherwise
        Returns:
        true if the text was found, false otherwise.

      • replaceText

        private boolean replaceText​(java.lang.String from,
                            java.lang.String to,
                            boolean caseSensitive,
                            boolean replaceAll)
        Replaces the text in the panel while respecting the initial formatting
        Parameters:
        from - the text to be replaced
        to - the replaced text
        caseSensitive - replace text ignoring case if false
        replaceAll - whether to replace all occurrences or just the first
        Returns:
        true if replaced successfully, false if unable to replace

      • selectionToUpperCase

        public void selectionToUpperCase()
        Converts the selected text to Uppercase.

        public void selectionToLowerCase()
        Converts the selected text to Lowercase.

      • replaceText

        private boolean replaceText​(java.lang.String from,
                            java.lang.String to,
                            boolean caseSensitive)
        Replaces the first occurrence of the text 'from' to the text 'to'
        Parameters:
        from - the text to be replaced
        to - the replaced text
        caseSensitive - replace text ignoring case if false
        Returns:
        true if able to replace, false otherwise.

      • replaceText

        private boolean replaceText​(java.lang.String from,
                            java.lang.String to,
                            boolean caseSensitive,
                            int fromIndex)
        Replaces the first occurrence of the text 'from' to the text 'to', starting the search from fromIndex
        Parameters:
        from - the text to be replaced
        to - the replaced text
        caseSensitive - replace text ignoring case if false
        fromIndex - the index from which to start the search
        Returns:
        true if able to replace, false otherwise.

        public void replaceText()
        Replaces the text in the textPane with a dialog for input

        public boolean confirmClose()
        Utility for closing the editor while warning about unsaved changes.
        Returns:
        true if ready to quit, false otherwise.
